extendedInfo.description: Career Igniter Resume Builder allows you to create a resume right on your Android smartphone.  Our resume maker is easy to use and is ideal for job candidates who are looking to create a professional resume to send to potential employers.  You can generate your resume on the spot in Microsoft Word (.DOC) format with our professional resume template.  This resume builder app helps you to create a professional resume in minutes without having to purchase expensive resume writing services,  saving you time and money.Key Features of our resume creator include:â¢	No account necessary.â¢	Full export to Microsoft Word.â¢	Option to email the resume to yourself or a potential employer.â¢	Automatically saves your resume data in resume builder for future use.â¢	Download resume directly to your Android smartphone.How to useJust install and launch our app.  Tap "New Resume" to create a new resume or "Open Previous Resume" to load the previous resume you were working on.  You'll then find yourself on the main page of our resume builder screen.  For each section,  tap and completely fill out the fields including your contact information, objective, education, certifications, work experience, skills and references. This step is critical since our resume builder was designed for you to complete all the fields in each section.For each section that you complete, you'll see a green checkmark indicator acknowledging that you have completed that section.  If you didn't fill out each field, a red x will be displayed.Once you have filled out each section, you can either click the Email Resume or Download Resume button.Email Resume will prompt you to select "send resume to yourself".   You can use this feature to access your resume from another computer including but not limited to your desktop computer, laptop, a tablet or another smartphone.  To send your resume to yourself, please remember that you will need word processing software on your computer to open .DOC files.  Software like Microsoft Word is popular word processing software that you need to open the resume to make edits.  Once you click "Send", we will then send an email to the employer with your resume attached.Download Resume allows you to download the resume right to your smartphone or your external storage device.  This allows you to save your resume if email access is not available.Career Igniter Resume Builder is free to download and use from the Google Play store.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t have proper job description category
reviews.comment: When it comes time to list job duties it does do in paragraphs not bulletin points. So you cant list your job duties one by one. Totally defeats the purpose of the app
reviews.author: Ali G

reviews.title: Simple and easy to use.
reviews.comment: Love this so easy to use especially because I have never done a resume before it saves to my SD card in case something happens and it gets erased on the app.

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: I went through all the trouble to do my resume, after saving it and looking at the file evertthing was all out of order and mixed up. Had some with wrong jobs under wrong duties it was horrible!!
